rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4}
Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {APG4789, ATS4838}

description: This unit enables students to prepare a folio of two music compositions for varied musical forces and present of a concert performance of at least one work. Studies include critical theory, musical applications of computers, studio technology and traditional score notation. Note: The two music compositions must be different to those presented for examination in the unit ATS4838 Special project: Composition part 1. Building on the minor exegesis developed in ATS4838, students formulate a research question and methodology relevant to their folio.
